title: Employability Enhancement Program Linked to Workplace Environments: Ethnographic Approach-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: General understanding of work environments and ability to use digital devices
context.additional_context: Construction of a practical learning environment based on in-service professionals' workplace experiences.

learning_goals: Learners can establish communication strategies suitable for workplace contexts by understanding the uniqueness and diversity of work environments.
Learners can systematically collect and analyze field research data by applying ethnographic observation techniques.
Learners can analyze practical examples of workplace literacy (document writing, reporting, collaboration, etc.) and propose ways to improve work efficiency.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
